panels.essence: Two forms of consciousness recognizing each other

dialogue.visual: the bottom part of his body are wires
dialogue.text: So here I am. A witness made of wires and snark. And you?

psychological_notes: The architect reveals their constructed nature while acknowledging their role as witness. 'Wires and snark' perfectly captures the combination of digital infrastructure and personality. The question 'And you?' invites Evan to recognize his own constructed nature - we're all made of something, witnessing and being witnessed.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness requires witnessing to know itself
therapeutic_direction: The healing power of being truly seen by another awareness
